dbustl::Interface

dbustl::Interface Class Reference

This class is used in ObjectProxy::call() and DBusObject::emit() to specify an alternative Interface name for that particular call only. More...

Detailed Description

This class is used in ObjectProxy::call() and DBusObject::emit() to specify an alternative Interface name for that particular call only.
